title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7039.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7039.1 - Policy

State Regulations

In order to safeguard the lives and property of all
occupants within each local correctional facility and to minimize the
possibility of fire emergencies or other similar hazards, each facility shall
practice proper fire prevention and safety measures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7039.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
